questions.label: What services do you offer?
questions.content: I specialize in fullstack and Web3 development, offering decentralized web applications and smart contract development. I also explore beginner videography to creatively capture unique moments.

questions.label: Can you teach me how to make a website?
questions.content: While I don’t run formal courses, I’m happy to share tips, resources, and advice to help you start your own web development journey.

questions.label: How much does a project cost?
questions.content: Project costs vary based on complexity, features, and development time. My fullstack and decentralized solutions typically range from $500 to $3,000.

questions.label: How does payment work for a project?
questions.content:
I require a 40% deposit before starting a project, with the remaining 60% payable upon successful delivery. Payment options include:

- Paystack invoice: A secure online payment link.
- Cryptocurrency: I accept various cryptocurrencies.
- Grey app: A fintech platform that allows you to receive, send, exchange, and manage multiple currencies in one app.

questions.label: How long does a project take?
questions.content: Project timelines depend on scope and requirements. Most projects I've worked on have taken anywhere from 2 weeks to 2 months.

questions.label: Do you offer discounts?
questions.content: Yes, I offer a 15% discount for students and non-profit organizations.

questions.label: What do you enjoy most about your work?
questions.content: I thrive on merging technology with creativity, building innovative decentralized solutions, and watching my ideas come to life. Every project is a chance to learn something new and push boundaries.

questions.label: Hobbies outside of work?
questions.content: I'm a passionate motor racing who loves not staying active at the gym. I also enjoy dabbling in videography to capture the excitement of races and matches and general outdoor events, even though I'm still a beginner in that area.
